title: Cross-post: Marketplace Roundtable With Fear & Greed Trader On Why There's Not Much To Fear In Today's Market
author: Seeking Alpha
dc:creator: Seeking Alpha
description:
In place of a 4th of July Wall Street Breakfast, we share an interview with one of our Marketplace authors and one of the more popular authors on Seeking Alpha, Fear & Greed Trader.

Steve Wells, the author behind the Fear & Greed Trader account and the Marketplace service Savvy Investor, explains why he is "not in a mode where I'm even thinking about lightening up on my exposure" as long-term trend lines indicate the bull market has longer to run. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
